turkish_example_sentence: Ben dün akşam kayıp anahtarı bulacaktım ama unutmuşum.
english_example_sentence: I was going to find the lost key yesterday evening but I forgot.
russian_example_sentence: Я должен был найти потерянный ключ вчера вечером, но забыл.
